name: We Are Legion
description: No unit caps. No limits. No mercy. I don't know if fast paced, retro arcade style strategy is a thing, but if it is, this is it. 我會看到你在戰場上。
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP (SP3) / Windows Vista® (SP2) / Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo E4400 or 2.0 GHz AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+ or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX® 9.0c–compliant with Shader Model 3.0 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

reviews.review_text: Very fun game! I can play this for hours and not get tired of it.

Super fun for fans of war and strategy games, it is simple in that you can easily throw yourself into the game, but complex because of the fact that so much is happening in such a short amount of time. It's very interactive and requires you to pay attention to a lot all at once.  I myself find this game to be very enjoyable, and although it has some graphic design downsides like the super simplified main menu and buttons, the exciting gameplay still manages to make me want to continue playing in the future.

This game is one of the best that I have played in a very long time. The simplicity of it is the difficulty of it. We Are Legion is very well crafted and its obvious that time was put into this game. I would recommend this game to all levels of RTS players. 9/10. -1- Low player amount, training missions there is no actual AI. just preset barrack points.   GET THIS GAME SO WE CAN TRASH EACH OTHER BEHIND ARMIES OF THOUUUUUSANDS.
The game has a failed online multiplier: i can never find matches, it was a good waste of my 15$.
